name: Navigation Tour
description: A tour through all the application tabs

steps.title: Welcome to RVCAT-WEB!
steps.description: This tutorial will show you the different parts of the application. Let's start with the Simulation tab.

steps.title: Simulation Results
steps.description: Here you can run simulations of your code. You get global performance metrics and the breakdown of the critical path of the total execution.

steps.title: Static Analysis
steps.description: The static performance analysis of the program's code detects potential bottlenecks and visualizes the data dependence graph.

steps.title: Timeline
steps.description: The Timeline shows the temporal evolution of the program's execution.

steps.title: Processor Settings
steps.description: Here you can configure processor parameters for simulations.

steps.title: Program Editor
steps.description: Here you can write and edit your programs for simulation.

steps.title: Tutorial Editor
steps.description: Here you can edit a tutorial (even this tutorial)

steps.title: Navigation Completed!
steps.description: Congratulations! You have completed the navigation tour
